column5: Prepare to progress into a senior role with an online MSc Management. Taught by research-active academics, relating theory to real-world practice from day one.A CAREER-FOCUSED MSC MANAGEMENT, DESIGNED FOR ASPIRING LEADERSThis 100% online MSc Management is for leaders and aspiring leaders aiming to progress into more senior roles. As you study, you’ll be developed into a well-rounded, thoughtful, active, reflective and practical professional with a genuine appreciation of strategic management and dealing with operational challenges when running an organisation.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
